extendedInfo.description: Keep an eye on the financial condition of the United States with the android Debt Clock app.Features:- National debt clock homescreen widget (long press the homescreen to add widget).- Tap widget to view expanded debt stats and economic indicators including debt per person, debt per taxpayer, unemployment rate and more.- Updates automatically with economic data from the U.S. Treasury, the Federal Reserve, the Bureau of Labor Statistics and other U.S. Government agencies.- Small footprint- Updates automatically 4 times per day (doesn't waste your battery).- Manual "refresh" lets you update the stats at any time.

reviews.title: Does exactly what it is supposed to
reviews.comment: This is a very useful tool that does exactly what is supposed to do. If every app were as well put together it would be splendid. Fantastic app!
reviews.author: Scott Conley

reviews.title: An Excellent App!
reviews.comment: Very few people are aware of the debt\'s monstorous size. This application helps keep me informed. It allows you to keep track of the federal debt, unemployment, the gdp, and other important numbers. I am very pleased with this applicarion.
reviews.author: Matthew Hurley

reviews.title: Worthy app
reviews.comment: Be informed about the USA with this informative app. Easy to refresh if necessary. Keep adding data to this app for 5 stars.
reviews.author: Matt K

reviews.title: Okay for free
reviews.comment: Okay app, good for debating purposes. However, its not live and the refresh does not update accurately.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: App works great! It does auto update contrary to what others are saying. It updates every 6 hours just like it says in the description. Continuously updating would destroy your battery.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Debt limit wrong
reviews.comment: The debt limit is $16.699 trillion, not $16.394 trillion. Has been since May 19, 2013. Otherwise, a great app.
